item.description:
For all those who enjoy outdoor concerts and want to hang on to a little more summer. Join us at the Guilford Fair friday night for BIG SHOT.





Conor will be the contact person for this. You can reach him at 203-927-2534. He will be in the band area.



General Admission:

Adults - $10.00
Senior Citizen - $8.00
Children 6-11 - $2.00
Children 5 and under - free


Directions:

From New York:
Take I-95 North to Exit 57. Follow signs to Fairgrounds. Shuttle lot available - follow the signs.

From New London:
Take I-95 South to Exit 57. Follow signs to Fairgrounds.
Shuttle lot available - follow signs to shuttle lot.

***Note: There will be NO shuttle from either exit 58 or 59 this year.

From Hartford:
Take 91 south to Route 9, and take the exit for Route 17 (just after the last traffic light). Follow Route 17 south through Durham to Route 77 south into Guilford. Once in Guilford follow the signs for the Fairgrounds or shuttle lot.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Conor near the band area.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Big Shot @The Guilford Fair
